title: Post error message for invalid password
body: on `/users/sign_in`

title: Aug 3 Demo Overview
body:
- [ ] auto-loaded GitHub / CVE data - unlimited GitHub coverage
- [ ] first integration of contract evaluation/resolution/status on the blockchain

title: Jul 27 Demo Overview
body:
- [x] userIDs with username/passwd
- [ ] fake currency with accounts, deposits, transfers, withdrawals
- [ ] manual-loaded github and cve data - minimal coverage
- [ ] GitHub match criteria: regex case-insensitive substring match on title, labels and status
- [ ] CVE match criteria: regex case-insensitive substring match on title
- [ ] Minimal contract publish, take and resolve function.  No reselling, no partial positions, no odds.

title: Test DevEnv Provisioning
body: End-to-End test of DevEnv Provisioning

title: AutoLoad GH Data
body: Cron Process - every 10 mins(?)

title: EventSourcing
body:
Add EventSourcing for server-side data auditability.

- contract CRUD
- user account CRUD
- tracker CRUD
- bug sync
- etc.

title: Fake Currency
body: Add fake currency with accounts, deposits, transfers, withdrawals

title: Team GitHub PR Training
body:
I like the nvie model for managing git branches etc.
- a master branch
- a dev branch
- a private dev branch for every developer
- feature branches as necessary

Would like to have a standard / trainable method.  Would like to learn and use the code-review feature.

title: Fix Devise CSS
body: The CSS on the devise pages is a little messed up.

title: Live homepage stats
body:
Add live marketplace stats to the right side of the jumbotron on the home page.

Things like:
- number bugs
- number of open contracts
- graph of market data
- etc.

title: Add Devise Email Support
body: For lost password, etc.

title: Add GitHub Login
body:
@zvibo could I get your help with this??  (omniauth?)

Related to #11

title: Add wallet key to user profile
body:
User should be able to login with either a UserID or just a wallet ID and private key(?)

Contracts with wallet ID that don't exist in our database should auto-create a user.

title: Add Google Analytics
body: Add google analytics.

title: Add presentations and whitepapers
body:
Put up an online trackersitory of presentations and white paper:
- blockchain
- prediction markets
- futures markets
- how to trade on Bugmark

title: Update Marketing Text
body: Add marketing text to replace the Lorem Ipsum on the home page.

title: Publish reward button

milestone.title: Functioning Dapp
milestone.description: This is a functioning Dapp in reward mode only.  Basic market contract and enough web3 to exercise the needed functionality.

body:
_From @richbodo on July 17, 2017 1:23_


This is the first web3 transaction()

Add a button to the issue detail page that allows someone to publish a new reward.

A form to publish should allow entry of the address, amount, and other publisher data.

Clicking the confirm button should return a transaction ID that can be viewed on etherscan.io if we are on the testnet.

_Copied from original issue: mvscorg/xdmarket#17_

title: Issue detail page

milestone.title: Functioning Dapp
milestone.description: This is a functioning Dapp in reward mode only.  Basic market contract and enough web3 to exercise the needed functionality.

body:
_From @richbodo on July 17, 2017 1:21_


Make each issue a link, and navigate to an issue detail page.

Issue detail page has all the issue data we know about, including a table of Rewards that have been published, which shows the state, amount, publisher, and counterparty (if any).


_Copied from original issue: mvscorg/xdmarket#16_

title: Update reward winner

milestone.title: Functioning Dapp
milestone.description: This is a functioning Dapp in reward mode only.  Basic market contract and enough web3 to exercise the needed functionality.

body:
_From @richbodo on July 5, 2017 3:47_

Write a smart contract function that enables the oracle to update a reward contract with a winner.

Note the time of reward - after this one we need to launch the payout function.

_Copied from original issue: mvscorg/xdmarket#13_

title: Basic Payout Function

milestone.title: Functioning Dapp
milestone.description: This is a functioning Dapp in reward mode only.  Basic market contract and enough web3 to exercise the needed functionality.

body:
_From @richbodo on July 4, 2017 23:33_


Can begin as a function of the market contract.

When called, pays out the specified reward contract.

https://github.com/mvscorg/xdmarket/wiki/Smart-Contract-Functional-Specs#basic-payout-contract
